1375590.name: Ary and the Secret of Seasons Original Soundtrack
1375590.description:
Ary and the Secret of Season is an adventurous tale experienced through beautiful visual style combined with an enchanting soundtrack creating a lingering atmosphere that will surely become a memorable gameplay experience. The original soundtrack includes 35 enchanted pieces.

The enchanting music featured in Ary and the Secret of Seasons OST was composed by Marcus Hedges. Marcus is a British composer based in Brighton, UK known for his orchestral video game cover arrangements as ‘The Trend Orchestra’. Marcus partnered with video game music publisher, Materia Collective to make the OST available on all music sale stores.
